meanings.definition: Work hard over a period of time.
meanings.sent1: She slogs through her homework every night.
meanings.sent2: He slogs away at his job to provide for his family.
meanings.sent3: The little ant slogs diligently to gather food for winter.
meanings.sent4: Time slogs on as she waits for the test results.
meanings.sent5: The determined student slogs through the difficult course material.

meanings.definition: A long, tiring walk or march.
meanings.sent1: After a day of slogs, his feet were sore and tired.
meanings.sent2: The soldiers went on a slogs through the muddy battlefield.
meanings.sent3: The family enjoyed a leisurely picnic after their morning slogs.
meanings.sent4: The hikers faced a challenging slogs up the steep mountain trail.
meanings.sent5: The marathon runner felt accomplished after completing the grueling slogs.
